thread.title: Beyoncé’s pregnancy announcement is the most-liked Instagram post of all time
thread.title_full: Beyoncé’s pregnancy announcement is the most-liked Instagram post of all time - The Verge

author: Lizzie Plaugic
title: Beyoncé’s pregnancy announcement is the most-liked Instagram post of all time
text:
Earlier today, we got a sweet, fleeting reprieve from our own realities when Beyoncé made the surprise announcement that she was pregnant with twins, via a Renaissance art-esque Instagram post . Unsurprisingly, the post rode the wave of internet excitement for hours, and now, with around 6,306,000 likes and climbing, it has become the most-liked post on Instagram to date.
Beyoncé, with 92.6 million followers, bests previous record-holder Selena Gomez, whose 2016 sponsored post of her slurping down a Coke garnered more than 6,305,000 likes. Gomez, with 108 million followers, still has the most popular account on Instagram.
We would like to share our love and happiness. We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters
A photo posted by Beyoncé (@beyonce) on Feb 1, 2017 at 10:39am PST
As Beyoncé’s like count climbed, the comments on Gomez’s reigning Instagram post were overtaken by ecstatic members of the Beyhive, buzzing about the impending takeover. But if tonight’s coup has taught us anything, it’s that Instagram users love pop music and famous babies — two things that will probably always be in great supply.
Congrats to Beyoncé! (On all of your achievements today.)
